paper_metadata.title: A rural livelihoods approach to irrigation policy in Tanzania

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The discussion explores livelihoods access to irrigation, including the subject of livelihoods diversification alongside irrigation
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Research methods The discussion is supported by data collected in the Morogoro region of Tanzania. Three out of six sub-villages in the village of Chanzuru were sampled

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: Alongside qualitative and quantitative surveys general PRA exercises and more focussed irrigation interviews were conducted

evidence_citations.country_citation: Research methods The discussion is supported by data collected in the Morogoro region of Tanzania
